emptyDashboard.title: Ready to Launch Your Next Project?
emptyDashboard.description: Your dashboard is empty, but it's full of potential. Create your first project to start generating powerful SEO content with AI.

deleteDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the "{{projectName}}" project and all of its associated data.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.description: Enter a new password for your account.

billingInfo.title: Billing Information
billingInfo.description: Manage your plan and credit balance.

usageHistory.title: Credit Usage History
usageHistory.description: A log of your recent credit transactions.

pricingDialog.title: Our Plans
pricingDialog.description: Choose the plan that best suits your needs. Each AI step consumes 1 credit.
pricingDialog.paymentNotice: Payment processing is not yet implemented.
pricingDialog.footerNote2: Do not share your access, this can harm your profile's development.

tiers.name: Basic
features: Keyword research (e.g., Semrush, Ubersuggest) in the target country
Creation of SEO-optimized categories and products
Generation of lightweight and responsive HTML pages
Translation of the project and pages to the desired language
üëâ For those starting out and needing a solid SEO foundation.

tiers.name: Standard
features: + Advanced blog optimization to be found by AI-powered searches
üëâ For those looking to gain visibility and increase traffic.

tiers.name: Premium
features: + SEO-optimized social media captions, enhanced by AI
+ Strategic feedback on the generated content
+ Analysis of detailed reports with data from Google Search Console
üëâ For those seeking a complete digital presence, combining SEO + Content + Data.

chatInput.disabledPlaceholder: Chat is disabled for this project.
chatInput.goldFeatureTooltip: This is a Gold Plan feature. Upgrade to unlock.

emptyChat.title: XpressSEO
emptyChat.subtitle: Your AI content assistant is ready.

errorDisplay.title: Workflow Error!
errorDisplay.message: The AI assistant encountered an unexpected problem and the workflow has been paused. Please contact support if the issue persists.

historySheet.title: Project History
historySheet.description: Review of all approved steps for "{{projectName}}".
historySheet.noStepsTitle: No steps have been approved yet.
historySheet.noStepsDescription: Continue the workflow to build the history.

chat.welcomeMessage: Hello {{userName}}! üëã I've started working on your project "{{projectName}}". I'll analyze your product and target audience, and I'll be back shortly with the first step.
chat.startPlaceholder: Paste a product link or describe your service to begin...
chat.startPrompt: Let's get started! I'm here to help you make money!

announcements.title: Manage Announcements
announcements.description: Create and manage site-wide announcements. Only one announcement can be active at a time.
announcements.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete this announcement. Are you sure?

feedbackDialog.title: Send us your feedback
feedbackDialog.description: We'd love to hear your thoughts on how we can improve.
feedbackDialog.label: Your feedback

feedbackViewer.title: User Feedbacks
feedbackViewer.description: Here you can see all feedbacks submitted by users.

feedbackReplyDialog.title: Reply to Feedback
feedbackReplyDialog.description: Craft a response to the user's feedback.

feedbackHistory.title: My Feedback History
feedbackHistory.description: View your submitted feedback and our responses.
feedbackHistory.noHistory: You haven't submitted any feedback yet.

chat.noCreditsToRegenerate: You don't have enough credits to regenerate.
chat.nextStepTriggerFailed: Failed to trigger the next step.
chat.outOfCredits: You've run out of credits! The workflow is paused.

projects.noCreditsToStart: Project created, but you have no credits to start the AI workflow.
projects.triggerFailed: Could not start the AI workflow automatically.
projects.resumeNoCredits: Project resumed, but you have no credits to continue the AI workflow.
